# GitHub Labels

Label scheme for Total Recall.

## Work Area Labels

| Label               | Color     | Description                                       |
|---------------------|-----------|---------------------------------------------------|
| **memory-model**    | `#9932CC` | Core memory types, tiers, attention, associations |
| **backing-service** | `#2E8B57` | Redis and other backing store implementations     |
| **transport**       | `#4169E1` | stdio, streaming HTTPS                            |
| **mcp-protocol**    | `#FF8C00` | MCP tool definitions, protocol handling           |
| **infrastructure**  | `#242f28` | Build, CI/CD, project structure                   |

## Type Labels

| Label             | Color     | Description                         |
|-------------------|-----------|-------------------------------------|
| **bug**           | `#d73a4a` | Something is broken                 |
| **enhancement**   | `#a2eeef` | New feature or capability           |
| **architecture**  | `#7057ff` | Structural change to service layers |
| **idea**          | `#e4e669` | Proposal for triage                 |
| **documentation** | `#0075ca` | Documentation only                  |

## Dependency Labels

| Label            | Color     | Description               |
|------------------|-----------|---------------------------|
| **dependencies** | `#0366d6` | Dependency update         |
| **actions**      | `#ededed` | GitHub Actions dependency |
| **gradle**       | `#ededed` | Gradle dependency         |

## Automation Labels

| Label                  | Color     | Description                             |
|------------------------|-----------|-----------------------------------------|
| **stale-issue**        | `#ededed` | Issue has been inactive for a long time |
| **stale-issue-closed** | `#ededed` | Closed due to inactivity                |
